title: Vayne Fix
body: I think the champion, monster or minion vayne condemns should briefly knock up and do the damage to the units it moves through like a lee sin kick but without the maxx health damage because vayne is supposed to be kitey but the cc is single target and that isnt the best.  In the same vein,  I think that she should get the yasuo Q treatment and abilities go up faster with attack speed not cooldown reduction,  like the diablo 2 trapsin

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Sergmeista,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=v4PplJQE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-18T06:38:42.718+0000)
>
> I love how all the vayne mains are downvoting your post. The champ OBVIOUSLY got buffed because she was receiving a skin. Now she's practically a GOD and Riot doesn't bat an eye. Because they're not the squishy support who has to deal with her two shotting everyone with her stupid passive and ult. This game is such a fucking piece of trash. A complete disgrace to what used to be League of Legends. I give it about a year. The game will eventually die. I'm going to throw a party when it does.

You do realize this post just wants to buff Vayne even further, right?

Vayne loses every matchup and gets out scaled in solo queue let alone coordinated play.  Maybe if we could have protect the X compositions with stuff like orianna and lulu vayne as she is now would be good but ori and lulu suck because of ap itemization
My post is asking for a vayne buff becuase she is more like a varus and less like a lucian did you read it/

> [{quoted}](name=Brony Gaymer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=v4PplJQE,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-02-18T02:23:05.999+0000)
>
> I think the champion, monster or minion vayne condemns should briefly knock up and do the damage to the units it moves through like a lee sin kick but without the maxx health damage because vayne is supposed to be kitey but the cc is single target and that isnt the best.  In the same vein,  I think that she should get the yasuo Q treatment and abilities go up faster with attack speed not cooldown reduction,  like the diablo 2 trapsin

This might give the layman a chance to play vayne rather than just lcs worthy players but wouldn't make her any better than the super best adcs like lucian and jinx
